title: WPFView bitmap dpi values are wrong
body:
WPFView bitmap creation uses wrong values for the dpi parameters.

In `SkiaSharp/source/SkiaSharp.Views/SkiaSharp.Views.WPF/SKElement.cs` the bitmap is created with:

`bitmap = new WriteableBitmap(width, height, dpiX, dpiY, PixelFormats.Pbgra32, null);`

but the `dpiX` and `dpiY` values are not dpi values, they are scaling factors (equal to 1.0 on my system). 

This creates problems if you save the View as an image and have tooling that uses the dpi values for processing.
